properties:
  - name: SurfaceGuiBase.Active
    summary: ''
    description: |
      This property determines whether the Class.SurfaceGui will sink input,
      for example if the parent or Class.SurfaceGuiBase.Adornee|Adornee part
      contains a Class.ClickDetector class like Class.DragDetector.

      Note that interactive UI elements like Class.ImageButton|ImageButtons
      and Class.TextButton|TextButtons inside a Class.SurfaceGui will only
      receive user input if they are parented to the Class.PlayerGui (the
      Class.SurfaceGui.Adorneee property can be used to target a part in the
      3D world while the Class.SurfaceGui itself remains in the
      Class.PlayerGui). Additionally, the part's
      Class.BasePart.CanQuery|CanQuery property must be true for the
      interactive UI element to receive input.
    codesamples: []
    type: boolean
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Data
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - UI
  - name: SurfaceGuiBase.Adornee
    summary: |
      Class.BasePart on which to apply the Class.SurfaceGui, overriding the
      default parent association.
    description: |
      Class.BasePart on which to apply the Class.SurfaceGui, overriding the
      default parent association.
    codesamples: []
    type: Instance
    tags: []

    threadsafety: ReadSafe

      - UI
  - name: SurfaceGuiBase.Face
    summary: |
      Enum.NormalId face upon which to apply the Class.SurfaceGui.
    description: |
      Enum.NormalId face of the Class.SurfaceGui parent (or its
      Class.SurfaceGuiBase.Adornee|Adornee) upon which to apply the
      Class.SurfaceGui.
    codesamples: []
